the amount of information that can be carried through a telephone wire, computer connection etc at one time
a measurement of the amount of information that can be sent from one computer to another on the Internet in a particular length of time
Greater bandwidth capacity has increased take-up of interactive services such as home shopping and home banking.
a measure of human intelligence, especially the ability of businesspeople to understand things quickly, to see how things are related etc
Many of the individuals in this book possess super-high bandwidth, incredible mental ability.
